xwikidoc.name: SVNConfigSheet
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} = SVN Repository Configuration: $doc.name = #if(!$request.action) #set($class = $doc.getObject('SVNCode.SVNConfigClass').xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName : $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end #end #if($request.action) #set($svnr = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("SVNCode.SVNGroovy")) #set($ok = $svnr.setXWiki($xwiki, $context)) #set($ok = $svnr.setSVNConfig($doc.fullName)) #set($ok = $svnr.initRepository()) #if($request.space) #set($space = $request.space) #else #set($space = $svnr.getDefaultSpace()) #end #end #if($request.action=="list") {{html wiki=true}}
    #set($list = $!svnr.getChangedPages($space)) #foreach($page in $list)
  • ${page} [[commit>>${doc.fullName}?action=commit&page=${page}&space=$!{space}]] #end
{{/html}} #elseif($request.action=="commit" && $request.confirm=="1") Committing the following pages: #set($pagelist = $xwiki.arrayList) #foreach($page in $request.getParameterValues("page")) * $page #set($ok = $pagelist.add($page)) #end $svnr.commitFiles($pagelist, $request.message) Commit finished successfully [[Back to List of pages to commit>>${doc.fullName}?action=list]] #elseif($request.action=="commit") ## confirm commit Please confirm commiting the following page {{html wiki=true}}
#foreach($page in $request.getParameterValues("page")) * $page #end Commit Message:

{{/html}} #else [[List pages to commit>>${doc.fullName}?action=list]] #end #if($request.action) DEBUG: $svnr.getDebug() #end {{/velocity}}
